room_title: Escape room "Casino Heist" by Sixth Sense Escape Games in Oklahoma City
review: Two of my teenage children and I did the Casino room and LOVED it. Donâ€™t waste your time and money going to another escape room in OKC. This one is the best!! You will be truly challenged.

room_title: Escape room "Casino Heist" by Sixth Sense Escape Games in Oklahoma City
review: Casino Heist was fantastic! Went with a group of 8 for a bachelorette party, loved every second of it. The staff was so helpful and kind! Totally will be going again!

room_title: Escape room "Casino Heist" by Sixth Sense Escape Games in Oklahoma City
review: Booked the Casino Heist room for my birthday this past weekend. So much fun! We had 5 in our group which was perfect! I love the hints that are given to keep you on track. It keeps the experience fun! Will definitely go back!
